Codebook for Getting and Cleaning Data Project 
========================================================

This Codebook is for the UCI HAR Data and the Tidy_Data file with Means created.

The final Tidy_Data.txt file has the following columns included:

    Subject          Numeric Indentifing key of subject         Integer
    Activity         Type of one of 6 Activities                Factor
    Mean Samples (Labeled by various variables, mean or std dev)Numeral


The following is a list of Measures recorded from the larger datasets, which contain means and standard deviations.
